00004 #ifndef SIM_ANNEAL_H
00005 #define SIM_ANNEAL_H 1
00006 
00007 #include <iostream>
00008 #include <math.h>
00009 #include <stdlib.h>
00010 #include <time.h>
00011 
00012 #include "controls.h"
00013 
00014 class Sim_Anneal
00015 {
00016 private:
00017   int num_expirations; // the number of tempertures in succession
00018                        // for which the target number of successful
00019                        // sample moves was NOT made.
00020   int num_moves;       // number of sample points successfully moved at current temperature
00021   int num_attempts;    // number of attempted sample point moves at current temperature
00022   int iteration;       // number of different temperatures processed, e.g 0,1,2,... 
00023   double T;            // current temperature, T >= 0
00024   double magic_number; // 1/Boltzman constant/T
00025   static double inverse_rand_max; // inverse of the range of pseudorandom integers 
00026   static double samples_to_random_range_ratio; // ratio of number of spline samples
00027                                                // to range of pseudorandom integers
00028   std::vector<double> energy;      // history of total energy in contour
00029   std::vector<double> temperature; // history of annealing temperature for contour
00030 public:
00031   Sim_Anneal             (void);
00032   int getRandomSample    (const int & num_samples);
00033   bool moreMoves         (const int & num_raw_points);
00034   void printEnergy       (char * const filename) const;
00035   void printTemperature  (char * const filename) const;
00036   void printScript       (const char * const energy_filename,
00037                           const char * const temp_filename,
00038                           const std::string & contour_name,
00039                           const int & contour_section) const;
00040   void debug             (const std::string & name,
00041                           const int & section,
00042                           const int & num_raw_points);
00043   double getNormalRandom (void);
00044 public:
00049   double getRandomPathParameterDisplacement (void)
00050   {
00051     double sign = -1.0;
00052     if ( (rand()*inverse_rand_max) < 0.5) sign *= -1.0; 
00053     sign *= getNormalRandom();
00054     return sign;
00055   }
00056 
00060   void decreaseTemp (void)
00061   {
00062     T *= Controls::instance().getTempScale();
00063     magic_number = 1.0/Controls::instance().getBoltzman()/T;
00064     num_moves    = 0;
00065     num_attempts = 0;
00066     iteration++;
00067   }
00068 
00073   bool isFrozen (void)
00074   {
00075     if (num_expirations>2) return true;
00076     if (T<Controls::instance().getEpsilon()) return true;
00077     else return false;
00078   }
00079 
00085   bool keepMove (double delta_energy)
00086   {
00087     // Changes to spline sample positions that raise the energy
00088     // of the sample system are accepted with some probability.
00089     // The acceptance probability is determined by the temperature
00090     // of the system (T), the change in energy due to the sample move (delE),
00091     // and the boltzman constant (kB): p=exp(-delE/kB/T).
00092     // This function yields acceptance probabilities near zero for very small
00093     // values of temperature, i.e. algorithm becomes more greedy as temp drops.
00094     double a = exp(-delta_energy*magic_number);
00095     return (rand()*inverse_rand_max) < a;
00096   }
00097   void setScale (const int & num_samples)
00098   {
00099     samples_to_random_range_ratio = (num_samples-1.0)*inverse_rand_max;
00100   }
00101   void reserveDetailedInfo (void)
00102   {
00103     energy.reserve(10000);
00104     temperature.reserve(10000);
00105   }
00106   void recordDetailedInfo (const double & current_energy)
00107   {
00108     energy.push_back(current_energy);
00109     temperature.push_back(T);
00110   }
00111   void recordSuccessfulMove (void)
00112   {
00113     num_moves++;
00114     num_attempts++;
00115   }
00116   void recordUnsuccessfulMove (void)
00117   {
00118     num_attempts++;
00119   }
00120 };
00121 
00122 #endif
